Added in 2.3.2
Sends a json-format chat message to the target player(s). JSON-messages are capeable of hover-events, click events and some other perks that are unavailable in the other message mechanics. They also support [color=rgb(86, 176, 79) !important]color codes and [color=rgb(86, 176, 79) !important]message variables.
The format of JSON-messages is a little more advanced than your everyday message. The syntax requires some extra symbols. If you donâ€™t know anything about writing JSONs, you can visit this page or this one for help.
Note that double quotes must be replaced with single quotes in JSON-message mechanics.
Please do not post issues relating to this mechanic in the bug-report subforums unless youâ€™re certain that your syntax is correct.
å±æ€§
Attribute
Aliases
Description
Default
messagemThe json-message to send. Must be surrounded by double-quotes.
ç¤ºä¾‹
You can use both bukkit color codes or json color formatting:
Skills:

  • jsonmessage{m=â€[{â€˜textâ€™:â€™&aHey, i am a JSON message!â€™}]â€} @trigger ~onInteract
  • jsonmessage{m=â€[{â€˜textâ€™:â€™Hey, i am a red JSON message!â€™,â€™colorâ€™:â€™redâ€™}]â€} @trigger ~onInteract

Hereâ€™s an example of how to make use of hover-events:
Skills:

  • jsonmessage{m=â€[{â€˜textâ€™:â€™&7With me, you can create hover eventsâ€™,â€™hoverEventâ€™:{â€˜actionâ€™:â€™show_textâ€™,â€™valueâ€™:{â€˜textâ€™:â€™&aI am a hover event â€˜}}}]â€} @trigger ~onInteract

And click events can be created like this. This is especially useful for the /mm signal command to create interactive quest mobs. This example would send the signal to the mob casting the json-message mechanic, if the player clicks on the click-event.
Skills:

  • jsonmessage{m=â€[{â€˜textâ€™:â€™&7&nAlso click events! â€˜,â€™clickEventâ€™:{â€˜actionâ€™:â€™run_commandâ€™,â€™valueâ€™:â€™/mm signal <mob.uuid> â€˜}}]â€} @trigger ~onInteract

entry.title: [Github]hexo-theme-ayer
entry.content:
æ‰“åŒ…ä¸‹è½½

ä¸€ä¸ªå¹²å‡€ä¸”ä¼˜é›…çš„ Hexo ä¸»é¢˜



ğŸŒŠ Ayer is a clean and elegant theme for Hexo, also fast, powerful and responsive. It contains many awesome features, Itâ€™s perfect for your blog, â€œAyerâ€ means â€œwaterâ€ in Malaysian and â€œyesterdayâ€ in Spanish. Create an issue if you have any queries or advice during the process of using,

æ³¨ï¼šæ”¶è—æœ¬ä¸»é¢˜è¯·ç‚¹å³ä¸Šè§’ Starï¼Œè°¢è°¢~~
å¦‚æœä½ æƒ³ç»™ä¸»é¢˜æ·»ç –åŠ ç“¦ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç‚¹å³ä¸Šè§’ Forkï¼Œç„¶åç»™æ­¤ä»“åº“æäº¤ PR

Preview é¢„è§ˆ

ä¸­æ–‡è¯´æ˜

å›½å†…é•œåƒ

Install

For hexo >= 5.0

  • If this theme is newly installed, a _config.ayer.yml file will be generated in the root directory after the installation is complete, and you can directly edit the _config.ayer.yml file for configuration.
  • If it is a theme upgrade, you can use the configuration method of hexo < 5.0, or you can move the original configuration file to the root directory and rename it to _config.ayer.yml.

For hexo < 5.0

Enable

Modify theme setting in _config.yml to ayer

Update

Multi Language Support

zh-CNï¼ˆä¸­æ–‡ç®€ä½“ï¼‰ enï¼ˆEnglishï¼‰ zh-TWï¼ˆä¸­æ–‡ç¹ä½“ï¼‰ jaï¼ˆæ—¥æœ¬èªï¼‰ esï¼ˆEspaÃ±olï¼‰ deï¼ˆDeutschï¼‰ frï¼ˆFranÃ§aisï¼‰ ruï¼ˆĞ ÑƒÑÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ï¼‰ koï¼ˆí•œêµ­ì–´ï¼‰ viï¼ˆTiáº¿ng Viá»‡tï¼‰ nlï¼ˆNederlandsï¼‰ noï¼ˆnorskï¼‰ ptï¼ˆPortuguÃªsï¼‰

English is default languge, if you want to change, modify language option in _config.yml file in your Hexo blogâ€™s root folder.

Configuration

let me know if you have any questions.

Plugins

  • hexo-generator-search (for Local Search)

    Then add the plugin configuration in hexoâ€™s configuration file _config.yml (note: not the themeâ€™s configuration file):

  • hexo-generator-feed (for RSS)

    Then add the plugin configuration in hexoâ€™s configuration file _config.yml (note: not the themeâ€™s configuration file):

  • hexo-generator-index-pin-top (for Sticky Post)

Categories

Then paste following codes to file: /source/categories/index.md

Tags

Same as categories.

Friend Links

Then paste following codes to file: /source/friends/index.md

Then edit friends_link in _config.yml

Gallery

Need to write in the head of the markdown, this is not a good way to write, I hope to get a better way to write on github.

Toc

Use Tocbot to parse the title tags (h1~h6) in the content and insert the directory.

  • ayer/_config.yml

  • If Toc is turned on in ayer/_config.yml, then Tocbot will generate a Toc article directory in the title tag of each blog parsing content, but not all blogs require Toc, so in the Front-matter section of markdown Can be closed:


Code Contributors

This project exists thanks to all the people who contribute.

Stargazers over time

License

Ayer by Eric-Shen is licensed under SATA-License.

The basic idea is, whenever using a project using SATA license, people shall star/like/+1 that project and thank the author. Just imagine Google stared your project and send you a thank-you letter because they used your project in github!
